sys_ux_data_broker_composite.api_name: x_snc_plants_db.EVAM data API with catalogId parameter binding
sys_ux_data_broker_composite.description: This databroker is similar to "EVAM Data Resource" with an additional capability of dynamic catalogId parmeter binding support. This is a temporary workaround for Quebec (only for related catalog items usecase) and eventually will go away when EVAM supports more generic dynamic paramters binding (to support all usecases) in future release.
sys_ux_data_broker_composite.name: EVAM data API with catalogId parameter binding
sys_ux_data_broker_composite.props: [ { "name": "evamDefinitionId", "label": "EVAM Definition", "description": "EVAM definition", "readOnly": false, "fieldType": "reference", "mandatory": true, "typeMetadata": { "reference": "sys_ux_composite_data" } }, { "name": "catalogSysId", "label": "Catalog Sys Id", "description": "Pass the sys_id of catalog to pull related catalogs for", "readOnly": false, "fieldType": "string", "mandatory": true, "defaultValue": "" }, { "name": "pageCursor", "label": "Page Cursor", "description": "Page cursor for EVAM pagination", "readOnly": false, "fieldType": "string", "mandatory": false, "defaultValue": "" }, { "name": "pageSize", "label": "Page Size", "description": "Page size for EVAM pagination", "readOnly": false, "fieldType": "string", "mandatory": false, "defaultValue": "20" }, { "name": "pageNumber", "label": "Page Number", "description": "Page number for EVAM pagination", "readOnly": false, "fieldType": "string", "mandatory": false, "defaultValue": "0" } ]
sys_ux_data_broker_composite.sys_name: EVAM data API with catalogId parameter binding
